column1: 272199,Grief Counsellor,,"Counsel clients or patients regarding personal issues
column3: Complete documentation required by programs or regulations
column5: Teach life skills or strategies to clients or their families
column7: Develop treatment plans for patients or clients
column9: Evaluate characteristics of individuals to determine needs or eligibility
column17: Modify treatment plans to accommodate client needs
column21: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column23: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column25: Intervene in crisis situations to assist clients
column27: Counsel family members of clients or patients
column29: Evaluate the effectiveness of counselling or educational programs
column31: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column33: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column35: Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column37: Advocate for individual or community needs
column39: Develop health assessment methods or programs
column41: Confer with family members to discuss client treatment plans or progress
column43: Develop working relationships with others to facilitate program activities
column47: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column49: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services",nan
